title: Style trade-offs
description: Quick A/B choices between two good options. Pick what feels most like you most of the time.

questions.question_text: To start something when energy is low, I’d rather…

choices.label: Kick it off with a playful spark and adjust as we go.
Steady everyone first so we’re grounded, then move.

questions.question_text: What keeps me engaged over a month?

choices.label: Sampling new angles and places.
Refining a favorite until it feels just right.

questions.question_text: When choices are foggy, I prefer to…

choices.label: Make a clean A/B call so we can move.
Name what matters and align on that first.

questions.question_text: For vibe and pacing, I’m more drawn to…

choices.label: A slow-burn with a tiny ritual or cue.
A quick spark that builds momentum fast.

questions.question_text: Attention dynamics I like more often:

choices.label: A little being-seen/celebrated can be energizing.
I prefer a private, cozy focus between us.

questions.question_text: If I must pick one flavor:

choices.label: Loose, playful improv that follows sparks.
Intentional polish and a sense of craft.

questions.question_text: Mid-flow a tempting detour appears. I’d rather…

choices.label: Follow curiosity and see where it goes.
Hold the line so we finish strong.

questions.question_text: Guidance that lands best for me:

choices.label: Mentor-style: clear, kind, thoughtful.
Playful dares/prompts that get me moving.

questions.question_text: Aesthetic feel I choose more often:

choices.label: Symmetry/staging and a little reveal.
Cozy, organic, less staged.

questions.question_text: When energy builds, my body prefers…

choices.label: A strong wave with decisive beats.
A gentler cadence with more finesse.

questions.question_text: In new terrain, I’m more often the one who…

choices.label: Scouts a path and sets a first move.
Anchors the vibe so everyone settles in.

questions.question_text: Signals and symbols in everyday life:

choices.label: I like subtle symbolic cues that carry meaning.
I don’t need symbols; I prefer spontaneous feel.

questions.question_text: When things get complex, my first move is to…

choices.label: Name what we want to feel so choices line up.
Try a small action to learn quickly.

questions.question_text: For memorable moments, I lean toward…

choices.label: Marking transitions so the arc is felt.
Keeping it casual and continuous.
